sentence.Network_en: The accident was caused by negligence on the part of the driver.
sentence.Network_cn: 事故是由于司机的过失造成的。

sentence.Network_en: The burden of proof lay on the plaintiff to prove negligence.
sentence.Network_cn: 证明对方犯有疏忽罪的举证责任落在原告身上.

sentence.Network_en: Many a customer has been lost through negligence of service.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于服务不周失去了许多老主顾.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... neglect v 疏忽，轻视 negligence v 疏忽，过失 recollection n 回想，回忆.
(3)“区分判断错误与过失“规则。为了强化不能以不良结果之发生来定性医生行为和医生有权基于医学判断在不同流派中做出选择这些观念，英美法系国家的法律又推出了“区分判断错误与过失“规则。该规则认为，尽管“判断错误(error in judgment)“和“过失(negligence)“这两个概念间有重叠，但两个概念间不能划等号。“判断错误“可能是过失，但并不必然是过失。如果医生已行.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from Latin negligentia, from the verb negligere (variant of neglegere 'disregard, slight': see neglect)

entry.def: If someone is guilty of negligence, they have failed to do something which they ought to do.

example.ex: The soldiers were ordered to appear before a disciplinary council on charges of negligence.
example.tran: 士兵们被控玩忽职守，被勒令接受纪律委员会的审查。

means.word_mean: 1. failure to act with the prudence that a reasonable person would exercise under the same circumstances
2. the trait of neglecting responsibilities and lacking concern

auth_sentence.content: The poor nurse will get the blame for negligence.
auth_sentence.res_content: The poor nurse will get the blame for negligence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The poor nurse will get the blame for negligence.

auth_sentence.content: This amounts to negligence and incompetence on their part.
auth_sentence.res_content: This amounts to negligence and incompetence on their part.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This amounts to negligence and incompetence on their part.

auth_sentence.content: The removal of clinical negligence cases is especially unfortunate.
auth_sentence.res_content: The removal of clinical negligence cases is especially unfortunate.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =tie,bind,表示"捆绑,联合,约束"; 2. =choose,gather,表示"选择,收集"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ob加强+lig捆绑,联合,约束+ate……的→adj.有责任的
re+lig捆绑,联合,约束+ious……的→受信念约束的
di分开+lig选择,收集+ent……的→分开选择,收集的,不一起选→勤勉的,勤奋的
e出+leg=lig选择,收集+ant……的→选出的→好的,高雅的
